https://tmrev.io/movie/101516-Bangkok Girl 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/19oPCUvNcs8IooQw4m8uEyo2IlP.jpg "Bangkok Girl" is a 'remarkably accomplished, beautifully photographed and intimate debut documentary that puts a human face on the devastating social issue that, sadly, is the fate of too many impoverished girls.' The documentary provides a glimpse of Thailand's sex tourism told through the experiences of a 19-year-old bar girl named Pla. Bangkok Girl
